title: Startups' Patch Technologies Could Extend Reach of Vaccines
author: Brian Gormley
description: Patches from startups including Micron Biomedical and Vaxxas could extend the reach of vaccines in nations where measles outbreaks occur because of relatively low vaccination rates.
cleaned_text: Reach of Vaccines Patches may solve 'last mile' challenge of delivering vaccines in remote locations In several countries the effort to eradicate measles runs into the logistical obstacle of insufficient cold storage for vaccines.
